title: Tori Kelly looks magical in monochrome as she attends CMT's Artist Of The Year
text:
Sometimes the best accessory is a husband dressed in all black, as music star Tori Kelly displayed on Wednesday at CMT's Artist of the Year event in Nashville, Tennessee.

The American Idol alum, 26, dressed to impress at the country music event, in a crisp white blazer over a scoop neck black top, along with the centerpiece of her outfit: fabulous large zebra stripe pants with matching belt.

Accompanying Tori to the event was her German basketball player husband of one and a half years, Andre Murillo, who complemented her perfectly in an all-black ensemble.

As simple as black and white: Tori Kelly and husband Andre Murillo dressed to impress on Wednesday at CMT's Artist of the Year event in Nashville

Murillo, 29, was in a leather jacket and simple black dress shirt.

Tori continued to steal the spotlight, with her wavy blond hair styled over one shoulder.

Adding a touch of country to her ensemble were her boots, which were white as well and adorned with steel-tipped toes.

Kelly accessorized with silver hoops in her ears and wore a season-appropriate black manicure.

Zebra chic: Kelly was in a crisp white blazer over a scoop neck black top, along with the centerpiece of her outfit — fabulous large zebra stripe pants with matching belt

What a pair: Murillo complemented his wife perfectly in an all-black ensemble

Tori, who won her first two Grammys earlier this year for her gospel album Hiding Place, was previously nominated for a Best New Artist Grammy in 2016.

In February, she scored trophies for both Best Gospel Album and Best Gospel Song.

Tori and Andre announced their engagement in September 2016 and officially tied the knot in May of 2018.

A touch of country: Tori continued to steal the spotlight with her wavy blond hair styled over one shoulder and white boots adorned with steel-tipped toes

'To have and to hold… to cherish and protect. My best friend said ‘yes',' the NBA basketball player captioned a sweet photo at the time of their engagement.

On the acting front, Kelly voiced the role of Meena in the 2016 animated hit Sing.

She will be reprising the role in the sequel to the film, Sing 2, which will premiere in 2021.
description: Sometimes the best accessory is a husband dressed in all black, as music star Tori Kelly displayed on Wednesday at CMT's Artist of the Year event in Nashville, Tennessee.
